positive_examples: This is an example of airship.
We observed airship in this context.
A typical case of airship would involve these features.
The concept of airship applies here.
A powered lighter-than-air aircraft that can be steered and propelled through the air using rudders and propellers or other thrust mechanisms.
negative_examples: This is an example of helicopter, not airship.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Helicopter, or other types of Aircraft

definition: A lighter-than-air aircraft that can be steered and propelled through air.
